channel.title: Lifeatdwarves on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Lifeatdwarves on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Life At Dwarves Software Design Group
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The idea: A path to better software “Everything in software architecture is a trade-off, and the why is more important than how.

item.title: Life At Dwarves With Hieu Vu
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Life at Dwarves #6, là những chia sẻ của Hiếu Vũ về hành trình pick up và yêu thích Golang, quá trình gắn bó từ dự án đến con người tại Dwarves.

item.title: Life At Dwarves With Nam Nguyen Keep Pushing Oneself Towards Goal
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Life at Dwarves #5 là câu chuyện về Nam Nguyễn và hành trình hơn 5 năm gắn bó với Dwarves. Sau khi hoàn thành Cao Đẳng, Nam làm ở một công ty offshore của Nhật Bản với vị trí Fullstack Engineer.

item.title: Life At Dwarves With Tom Nguyen Remote Working At Dwarves
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: A catch-up with Tom - our Data Lead, and hear how remote working has fit him perfectly. Tom is one of our core contributors of Dwarves Brainery, and he’ll be playing as a key mentor for our upcoming Apprenticeship.

item.title: Life At Dwarves With Anh Tran How Its Like To Be A Head Of UI
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Anh, in short, is the UI wizard behind most of our branding identity. You’ll be seeing her work of art on every Dwarves’s digital asset.

item.title: Life At Dwarves With Thanh Pham Ensure A Place Where People Can Thrive
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Been with us for nearly 5 years, Thanh has been taking care of the juniors and ensuring their progress goes alongside the company’s direction.
